channel.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
channel.description: Does anyone know or we going to wait another decade before we see it?

item.description:
Old thread is old.

item.source: When is XEN level/chapters being released?

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

Agreed, I personally loved the early platforming… it was a nice shake up to the game. Also it actually gave the low gravity a purpose. It just needs to be re-purposed instead of cut… if it gets cut I will be very sad indeed. It just wouldn’t be Xen anymore.

Hey, if too much gets cut, I’m sure Text would always be happy to make a ‘Xen Uncut’ mod. XD

Late reply is late.

Read full topic

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
We also have absolutely no idea how they’ve been working on it, or how far they’d progressed before the initial release, so there is no point in debating how much longer it will take. We simply have no clue.

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
Remaking things can sometimes be harder than making stuff from scratch, because you have to be careful to get it jusssst right. Whereas making something from scratch you are open to doing what you want from the start. So the fact that they are changing a lot does not have to mean it will take longer.

item.source: When is XEN level/chapters being released?

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: RossBondReturns
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

Agreed, I personally loved the early platforming… it was a nice shake up to the game. Also it actually gave the low gravity a purpose. It just needs to be re-purposed instead of cut… if it gets cut I will be very sad indeed. It just wouldn’t be Xen anymore.

I agree there have to be some jumping puzzles involved.

When I practiced using the long jump module after getting it I could help but note that the sound it made made me think of RCS rockets (the adjustment rockets say on the orbiter).

This opens to me the possibility that on Xen it might just act a lot more like the kind of jetpacked spacesuit seen in multiple films of the SF variety. If that’s the case it opens a whole new level to the Xen gamplay that could be all kinds of awesome.

Read full topic

item.source: When is XEN level/chapters being released?

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: Artlav
item.description:
Lack of Xen imagery during resonance cascade is very suggestive, along with lack of any leaks and so on.

My bet is that they are still on a concept stage, or at most at orange-mapping stage and starting to flesh it out.

It took about 3 years to get contemporary BMS finished, and Xen is said to be bigger than before, so my guess is we might see Pluto up close before Xen is out (2015).

Read full topic

item.source: When is XEN level/chapters being released?

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
My estimate is that it will take about 6-8 months if they keep at a good pace. That’s just long enough that releasing now wouldn’t be stupid, and also a decent amount of time to get a lot done. I don’t see it taking more than a year tops though. And definitely not before the end of this year.

Well, then there’s also deathmatch to consider, which doesn’t sound like it’s gotten tooo far yet, lol:

bms_stormseeker: going to go play some BLACK MESA DEATHMATCH
…time passes…
bms_stormseeker: hey … im back
» DM was laggy
sanfrod: haha yeah it doesn’t really work
» it would have been nice to know who i killed
bms_stormseeker: and san cheated
sanfrod: oy
bms_stormseeker: by teleporting everywhere
» (by lagging)
sanfrod: i had to deal with raminator’s dodgy as *** controls
bms_stormseeker: we just have to deal with dans dodgy ***
sanfrod: it’s a wonder i killed anything

Read full topic
item.source: When is XEN level/chapters being released?

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Yeah, I asked in Got a Question and the answer was “not this year” or something to that effect.

I doubt very much it will take until 2014. My guess is early-mid 2013. I doubt it will be any later than next summer.

Read full topic
item.source: When is XEN level/chapters being released?

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: Verdale
item.description:
M-Man:

Raminator I believe said that it would not be this year. (I don’t remember where that quote is exactly)

I can vouch for also seeing that being stated, but I have no idea where.

Bloodshot:

Well remember they aren’t just redoing the final Xen levels, they are completely redesigning it to be not shit, and making Xen longer - so that could take a while.

Right, but unfortunately most of the people here are too lazy to read the resources the developers have been so kind to give them and instead post about wanting it now, like they are Veruca Salt in a chocolate factory.

Read full topic

item.source: When is XEN level/chapters being released?

item.title: When is XEN level/chapters being released?
item.dc:creator: Verdale
item.description:
A scientist:

^ what she said.
My money’s on Xmas.

Uhm, my money’s not. I’m almost definite that one of the BM team members said not to expect it within this year. Also, if they were going to release them so close to each other, then why wouldn’t they just wait to release a finished product? After 7-8 years of waiting, I doubt they’d worry about losing a fanbase within a few more months.

Read full topic
